text: Saboda haka kowanensu Mun kama shi da laifinsa. Watau daga cikinsu akwai wanda Muka aika iskar tsakuwa a kansa kuma daga cikinsu akwai wanda tsawa ta kama, kuma daga cikinsu akwai wanda Muka birkice Æ™asa da shi kuma daga cikinsu akwai wanda Muka nutsar. Ba ya yiwuwa ga Allah Ya zalunce su, amma sun kasance kansu suke zalunta
